title: Calculating difference scanning files
body: after having tried all the solving suggestions in the support section, having uninstalled and reinstalled, even restarted my computer, i am still at this point, and unfortunately know not what to do. any help is appreciated, thank you.

replies.body:
Hey Cerazyn,

I hate it when this happens!  For me, it always happens if I have a hiccup or disconnection while patching.  If the patcher interrupts, it has to rescan all the files before it tries to patch again.  Unfortunately, there's no way to bypass this until it's finished scanning...everything.  :X
Darn..at least i have time to kill i guess. Thank you for the reply ^^ i was quite worried.

Hey Cerazyn!

I just wanted to follow up with you to see if after leaving this screen there for over an hour, did it ever start the actual patching process?  Or did it still error out?

Reply back and let me know! :)
yeah after about an hour it began patching again, thank you for the follow up ^^ I actually played a game after logging in and won :D
Awesome!  :D  Sounds like #2015SeasonSilverTierTheDream is going to happen!  ^.^
